title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

  • Contains a clear, well-developed thesis that recognizes the extent to which the characterization is accurate

  • Supports the thesis with considerable, relevant information

  • Analyzes two categories effectively; treatment of categories my be somewhat uneven

  • Analyzes two categories effectively; treatment of categories may be somewhat uneven

  • May contain minor errors

5-7:

  • Contains a thesis that may only partially develop the extent to which the characterization is accurate

  • Supports the thesis with some relevant information

  • Analyzes two categories in a limited way; treatment of categories may be substantially uneven

  • May contain errors that do not seriously detract form the quality of the essay

2-4:

  • Contains confused or unfocused thesis, or may simply restate the question

  • Provides minimal relevant information, or lists facts with little or no application to the thesis

  • Analyzes only one category, OR describes one or two categories in a general way

  • May contain substantial errors

0-1:

  • Lacks a thesis or paraphrases the question

  • Demonstrates an incompetent or inappropriate response

  • Little to no understanding of the question

  • Contains major factual errors

The “—” Essay:

  • Blank or off topic
